headline: The Oscar Leaders, And the Overlooked
abstract: “The Irishman,” “Once Upon a Time … in Hollywood” and “1917” each received 10 nominations. Black actors and actresses were largely overlooked.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — The 92nd Academy Awards will be a showdown between old and new Hollywood: Netflix amassed a leading 24 nominations on Monday, including best picture honors for “The Irishman” and “Marriage Story,” but traditional studios were only a heartbeat behind.
keywords: ACADEMY OF MOTION PICTURE ARTS AND SCIENCES
Once Upon a Time in Hollywood (Movie)
